## Dot Pipes

### Input Data

```{r}
variable <- c(1,2,6,8,9,15)
```

### Forward Dot Pipe

```{r}
mean(variable,trim=.2)
variable %.>% mean(.,trim=.2)
variable %.>% mean(.,trim=.2) %.>% round(.,digits=1)
```

### Backward Dot Pipe

```{r}
mean(variable,trim=.2)
mean(.,trim=.2) %<.% variable
round(.,digits=1) %<.% mean(.,trim=.2) %<.% variable
```
